version_name: 7.2.28Introducing the all-new Send Anywhere for iOS - a complete redesign for more intuitive

7.4.11= Fixed =• Fixed an error that some photos could not be saved in the camera roll.• Fixed an issue where music did not play continuously after a call during music playback.• Other bug fixes and performance improvementsWe value your feedback

7.4.26= New =• Renewing the shared link    - You can renew the shared link in activity menu.   - Tap the clock icon and the expiration date will be extended back to 48 hours. = Improved =• Video Player  - Video quality and various functions have improved!
